size_type XalanDocumentFragmentNodeRefListBaseProxy::getLength ( ) const [virtual]
 

Determine the number of nodes in the list.

The range of valid child node indices is 0 to length-1 inclusive.

Returns:
number of nodes

Reimplemented from NodeRefListBase.

Returns:

Reimplemented from NodeRefListBase.

XalanNode * XalanDocumentFragmentNodeRefListBaseProxy::item ( size_type index ) const [virtual]
 

Returns the indexth item in the collection.

If index is greater than or equal to the number of nodes in the list, this returns null.

Parameters:
index   index into the collection
Returns:
node at the indexth position in the NodeList, or null if that is not a valid index

Reimplemented from NodeRefListBase.
